<!--READ ME BEFORE YOU CHANGE THE SOUND TABLE. Please do not change "Hostile Mobs" to "Neutral Mobs" or something else. If you don't know, the source in Java Edition is when you go to the pause screen and click options, then go to music and sounds. You can change the volume of "Hostile Mobs," which this mob makes sounds under this group. Calling this mob "Neutral" is technically unofficial as neither the game nor its code calls this mob a neutral creature. Our Minecraft Wiki community calls this mob neutral to draw the line between passive/friendly and hostile, and uses this term despite being unofficial.-->
